doc.field: regional water features: City of Portsmouth GIS Datasets (Datastack)

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library's Scholars' Lab by the Portsmouth GIS Office / Information Technology Department of the City of Portsmouth, Virginia, USA, and is provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. It pertains primarily to infrastructure within the City of Portsmouth as well as related natural features. * // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the datastack is generally 2003- 2005, but some datasets may include data that originated earlier. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): * Street Centerlines - incl. street name. * Buildings (footprints) - incl. building, school, or subdivision name. * Planimetric Lines (building footprints, street edges, parking areas, bridges, piers, shorelines, rivers, creeks, other surface hydrologic features). * Chesapeake Bay Resource Protected Areas (RPAs) and Resource Management Areas (RMAs) * Chesapeake Bay Intensely Developed Areas (IDAs) within the RPAs and/or RMAs. * Regional Hydology and Open Water Bodies (for most of the Tidewater region) * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
